lead_paragraph: Manager Bob Bradley has urged Swansea City supporters to unite and roar their side to victory in Saturday's Premier League match against fellow strugglers Crystal Palace at the Liberty Stadium.

headline.print_headline: Swansea's Bradley Calls for Togetherness Ahead of Palace Clash
headline.main: Swansea's Bradley Calls for Togetherness Ahead of Palace Clash

snippet: Manager Bob Bradley has urged Swansea City supporters to unite and roar their side to victory in Saturday's Premier League match against fellow strugglers Crystal Palace at the Liberty Stadium....
